Text.Page:
Everyone's moaning about these Gutrends, but it's the hyenas giving me trouble. Killing my animals left and right.

Tell you whatâ€”go slash up a few of those {@LinkCreature:6#1031#ravenous} and {@LinkCreature:6#1032#starving hyenas} on my property.

Uh...please?

Decent enough, I guess. Too bad you weren't here earlier, though.

Anyhow,...well, it's something, ain't it?
